all_text_timv: Christmas carols and motets [sound recording] = Weihnachtscarols und Weihnachtsmotten = Canti di Natale e mottetti = Motets et chants de Noëls. Weihnachtscarols und Weihnachtsmotten Canti di Natale e mottetti Motets et chants de Noëls. U.K. : Gimeli Records, [1986] ℗1986 1 audio disc : digital, stereo. ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Compact disc. Program notes by Peter Phillips in English, Italian, German and French (15 p.) inserted in container. Angelus ad virginem -- Nowell sing we -- There is no rose -- Nowell: Dieu vous garde -- Lullay: I saw -- Lully, lulla thou little tiny child -- Lullaby / William Byrd -- Ave Maria / Josquin des Pres -- Ave Maria / Philippe Verdelot -- Ave Maria for four voices ; Ave maria for double choir / Victoria -- Es ist ein Ros' entsprungen / M. Praetorius -- Joseph lieber, Joseph mein / H. Praetorius -- In dulci jubilo / H. Praetorius -- Wachet auf / M. Praetorius (verses 1 & 2) ; J.S. Bach (verse 3). Tallis Scholars ; Peter Phillips, director. Recorded in the Church of Saint Peter and Saint Paul, Salle, Norfork. Motets. Chorales. Ave Maria (Music) Carols. Phillips, Peter, 1953- Tallis Scholars. Motets et chants di Noëls. Canti di Natale e mottetti. Weihnachtscarols und Weihnachtsmotten.
